Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput

Interface MouseEnterListener

All Superinterfaces:
GameNode
public interface MouseEnterListener extends GameNode
Being a MouseEnterListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if the Mouse Cursor has entered the area defined by the BoundingBox of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    attachMouseEnterListener()
    Attach a MouseEnterListener to this YaegerEntity or YaegerScene
    void
    onMouseEntered()
    Called when the corresponding Node receives a mouse enter event.
